titleStmt.title: A letter from Mr. Donald Cargill to his paroch of the Baronny Kirk in Glasgow. March the 27th 1681.
titleStmt.author: Cargill, Donald, 1619?-1681.

notesStmt.note: Letter written by Cargill, a Covenanting preacher, shortly before his execution in Edinburgh on 27 July, 1681.
Imperfect: tightly bound with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
